channel.title: Beta Testing/Pimpage
channel.description: Let people beta test your mod/mutator and receive suggestions before you release officially.

item.title: Another new UT1 mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (H0B)
item.dc:creator: H0B
item.content:encoded:
This is another small mutator for Unreal Tournament 1 called AlienMode.

AlienMode spawns pupaes and pupae eggs around the map that will infest the map in different areas if not killed. The pupaes start out small and grow to larger pupaes overtime that will then create eggs. It is possible to kill all of the pupaes and eggs on the map but is usually very hard as they tend to sneak past you and infest a new area. It also has two options for MaxAliens and MaxEggs.
The download is...

Another new UT1 mutator

item.title: Burning Face - 2 Muts in 1!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hamster_Stlye)
item.dc:creator: Hamster_Stlye
item.content:encoded:
Preamble:
--------

I searched for a mod that would help tone down camping for UT99 with little luck. Then I ran across 'FairGame' and decided it was pretty close, but I didn't want people to suffer for being within the same 'x' number of units from the last position it checked. I wanted it to check the BASE areas only, and I wanted it to be much more accurate so people who were NOT camping wouldn't get penalized. It took some time to tune but I think I've done just that......

Burning Face - 2 Muts in 1!

item.title: AlphaCoop beta released and looking for mappers

item.dc:creator: AlphaOne
item.content:encoded:
Beta Released
I would like to tell everyone that I'm releasing a beta version of my AlphaCoop mod to the public. View the site for more info:
http://wiki.beyondunreal.com/wiki/AlphaOne/AlphaCoop

What is AlphaCoop?
AlphaCoop is an Unreal Tournament 2003/2004 game type. "When you take some invasion fun, coop teamwork, monster hunt gameplay, unreal1...

AlphaCoop beta released and looking for mappers

item.title: my first weapon ("shoota") ut1
item.author: invalid@example.com (DushnoK)
item.dc:creator: DushnoK
item.content:encoded: Something I started some months ago..Well now I got a crappy mesh working and code works too (at least in sp). It's a fractal rocket launcher (primary fire), it launches a rocket wich past a small distance divides itself into two clones wich repeat the same process ad infinitum . Secondary fire is a lame ass snipe . It's quite stupid and rather unplayable, but if you want to try it here's a link to a beta : click here

item.title: DoubleJumpUT
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mr.Mitchell)
item.dc:creator: Mr.Mitchell
item.content:encoded:
I had this mutator for a long time on my disk now and finally wrote a readme for it. DoubleJumpUT brings doublejumping from UT2003 to UT nothing more, nothing less. Works on-line, but no botsupport (don't know how to implement it).

Get it from http://home.ict.nl/~mweterin/unreal

item.title: LawDogs
item.author: invalid@example.com (beefsack)
item.dc:creator: beefsack
item.content:encoded:
Sorry if I am posting this in the wrong forum, move it or delete it if its a nuisance

I love my UT2003 mods, and I'm not sure if you guys have checked it out, but LawDogs is an absolute blast. I can't stop lanning with it, but the main thing that's hurting it at the moment is a real lack of publicity and, in turn, a lack of servers, which is a real shame. I think it would be great if you guys could give it a spin

item.title: Redeemer 2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wormbo)
item.dc:creator: Wormbo
item.content:encoded:
Rockets UT still takes a while to get finished but I thought the Redeemer effects look so cool, I shouldn't hold them back any longer.
Redeemer 2k3 brings the UT2k3 Redeemer's visual effects to UT. (Yes, this is a UT mod.)

Download

Screenshot 1 - Guided Redeemer (that small cam view is not available in this mutator, though)...

Redeemer 2k3

item.title: Sierra sponsored TC MOD looking for scripters/coders
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trajan)
item.dc:creator: Trajan
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm a representative for the team making a massive total conversion MOD for the upcoming "Tribes:Vengeance" game by Sierra. The MOD is based on characters and situations from the Starsiege Universe (Starsiege and Tribes), and is officially sponsored by Sierra and planned for inclusion with the release of T:V in Q4 of 2004. The MOD is being developed on the UT2k3 engine (which is the underlying engine being used for T:V) and will be ported over at release. Hence the reason this...

Sierra sponsored TC MOD looking for scripters/coders

item.title: Wanted : botnames ...
item.author: invalid@example.com (JaFO)
item.dc:creator: JaFO
item.content:encoded:
I'm sure pretty much everyone wants to get rid of Alarik, Visse & co.
Some mods already have bots with different names (Tactical Ops & Pearman are examples), but you might find those stupid, offensive or just plain boring.

However thinking of 32 (or more if you use the Xbots-mutator) different names for your bots can be a real challenge.

To lighten the load I'm adding a "random botnamegenerator" to the next version of the Bot-editor I'm working on.

Since I can only think of so...

Wanted : botnames ...
